column3: “the taste takes you to wonderland bitch”
“Tasted like perfume on first hit with a vaporizer. Made me feel calm and mellow”
“lol the hash that won the cannabis cup was not strain specific...just so you know...”
“Excellent for a break. You will stop What you are doing for sure!”
“The taste is definitely good. No complaints here. And the bud structure is perfect scones like a dream.”
